item.title: 01 - Hacking Lab - The idea
item.description: Welcome Hi! Hello! Welcome! My name is xander and I like cyber security, software development and servers. This blog will be my personal blog about cyber security, software development and servers. Let’s see! Leave me a comment if you have questions or just want to say hi. First project: Hacking Lab What is a hacking lab? It’s basically a playground for my cyber security stuff. To get a better understand I want to build my own infrastructure and then attack it.
